DOC.brief_summary: To assess the bioefficacy of omega-3 fatty acids (provided by intake of fish oil supplements) depending on genotype of relevant factors in lipid metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: To assess the bioefficacy of omega-3 fatty acids (provided by intake of fish oil supplements) depending on genotype of relevant factors in lipid metabolism.
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult between 18 and 40 years of age BMI between 18.5 and 30 kg/m2 Sedentary to moderate physical activity habits Concomitant treatment: Consumption of dietary supplements or any medication that can affect the study outcomes Actively smoking Suspected abuse of alcohol or illicit drugs Significant illness within the two weeks prior to study start or any active systemic infection or medical condition that may require treatment during the study Known or suspected medical condition related to coagulation Subject who cannot be expected to comply with the study procedures Currently participating or having participated in another clinical trial during the last 4 weeks prior to beginning of this study
